name: Fear
effect: Autohit, each enemy model within 1 M who fails their Willpower save roll must move 1 M away from the psychic.

name: Heal
effect: 1 model within 1 M of this model and in LoS heals d4

name: Inspire
effect: Target Ally can make a free Move or Recover Horror action

name: Exhaust
effect: Autohit, on failed WP save, the target loses one action on its next activation instead of taking damage.

name: Overchannel
effect: This model may immediately use any Psychic Power it knows, even if it has already been used this activation. After resolving the power, this model automatically gains 1 Horror token.

name: Psychic Feedback
effect: When this model successfully deals damage with a Psychic Attack or Mutation, the target gains 1 Horror token, and this model then gains 1 Horror token.

name: Horrible Scream
effect: LoS, Auto hit Blast AoE, Save or gain 1 Horror

name: Mind Control
effect: Targeted enemy takes one action of the psychic's choice.

name: Divination
effect: Choose any model in LoS either gain +2 or -2 for all their actions this round.

name: Blink
effect: Place the psychic anywhere on the board.

name: Mind Stab
effect: Target 1 enemy model within 1 M. Attack with 2 D and -3 AP

name: Growth
effect: Pick a or b: a. Spawn a Bio Spawn from Caster b. Shape Bio Spawn into Mimic -OR- Shape Mimic into an Abomination
